text.value: Hi Link! We had problems with Ganon's soldiers.
They came out of nowhere with the intention of kidnapping Zelda
but she managed to escape into the forest, at the southwest.
We need your help, bring Zelda back please.
I forgot! You can attack in four directions
using ABXY and dodge with RB.
Go to the forest and find Zelda.
You are our last hope, good luck Link.
The instant of a close of eyes is enough to make a peaceful man a warrior.
I can see fear on your eyes, be brave Link.
The soldiers stole my chickens, I'm so sad. They are bad people.
Bring my chickens back please.
A group of soldiers have gone to the forest,
I don't know what they are looking for.
A group of soldiers have gone to the forest,
I don't know what they are looking for.
To the left is the entrance to the forest,
be very careful if you are going to enter there.

be very careful if you are going to enter there.
Hey! I think you do not talk so much, I like you.
Good boy.
I love turtles but I can not find any one in this village.
I'm so sad.
I'm glad to see you again Link, thank you for save me.
This morning a group of soldiers came trying to take me to Ganon,
but I managed to escape into the forest and hide here.
I need your help to get my home back, could you throw out all the soldiers of the village?
It's dangerous to go alone, take the book behind me.
Thank you so much Link.
Kakariko is on danger, throw out all the soldiers of the castle please.
